hello julian.

On 2012-03-08 08:59 , Julian Reschke wrote:
> On 2012-03-08 16:21, Markus Lanthaler wrote:
>> Unfortunately I'm not aware of any. Haven't seen profile being used in
>> practice so far.
> hcard. dc-html...
> They are even produced by rfc2629.xslt when you format your Internet
> Draft :-)

http://dret.net/netdret/docs/draft-wilde-profile-link-00.html doesn't 
have that, but maybe that's because i produced it at the xml2rfc site 
and not by running the stylesheet myself? but thanks a lot for the 
examples, so we do have at least two existing profile URIs in the wild:

hcard: http://microformats.org/profile/hcard
dublin core: http://dublincore.org/documents/2008/08/04/dc-html/

both resolve to useful documentation, which is nice. i'll add those to 
the examples section in -01.

thanks and cheers,

dret.
